name: AFGBuildablePipelineSupport
comment: Base class for variable length pipe supports

methods.name: SetupConnectionComponent
methods.comment: Sets the connection component to be at correct height and registers

properties.name: mSupportComponentDefaultMesh
properties.comment: The component we want to use with the support

properties.name: mSnapOnly0
properties.comment:
Connection component used
OST BE SET FROM CONSTRUCTION SCRIPT OR IT WILL BE NULL!

properties.name: mSupportLengthComponent
properties.comment: The scene component for adjusting the length of the support.

properties.name: mSupportLengthOffset
properties.comment: Used to store the initial offset of the support length component, so we can compensate for it during placement

properties.name: mSupportMesh
properties.comment: Static mesh to use when rendering

properties.name: mUseStaticHeight
properties.comment: Should the stack height only be calculated using the mStackHeight?
